ToolDescription: Whisper is a general-purpose speech recognition model. It is trained on a large dataset of diverse audio and is also a multi-task model that can perform multilingual speech recognition as well as speech translation and language identification.
ToolShortDescription: Multi-task speech recognition, translation, language ID
